activities:
In the course of operating the Monetate Platform Monetate may collect PII in the form of IP address and an email address.   The Monetate products collect the IP address of visitors solely to provide city level location-based services related to the products and place, on customer’s behalf, a “first-party cookie” in each such visitor’s web browser, if configured to accept such cookies.  
Any email address collected is subject to a consumer's ability to opt in/ opt out.  Monetate does not collect any PII on monetate.com unless it is supplied voluntarily.  Any PII supplied voluntarily on monetate.com is used for email marketing purposes.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Online non PII data and limited PII data of an IP address and an email address (in some cases) on Monetate's platform and online voluntary PII data from Monetate's website.
recoursemech: Monetate is a member of the Better Business Bureau ("BBB") EU Safe Harbor program
